text.section:
An applicant for a license to act as a manufacturer shall:
submit an application to the Comptroller on the form and containing the information that the Comptroller requires; and
pay to the Comptroller a fee of $25.

section.section:
An applicant for a license to act as a retailer shall:
obtain the county license required under § 16-301 of this title;
submit to the clerk an application for each permanent or temporary place of business located in the same enclosure and operated by the same applicant; and
pay to the clerk a fee of $30.

The application shall:
be made on the form that the clerk requires; and
contain the information that the Comptroller requires.

text.section:
An applicant for a license to act as a storage warehouse shall:
submit an application to the Comptroller on the form and containing the information that the Comptroller requires; and
pay to the Comptroller a fee of $25.

An applicant for a license to act as a subwholesaler shall:
submit an application to the Comptroller on the form and containing the information that the Comptroller requires; and
pay to the Comptroller a fee of:
$500 for a 1-year term; or
the amount that results when $500 is prorated to the nearest month, if the application is for less than a 1-year term.

An applicant for a license to act as a vending machine operator shall:
obtain the county license required under § 16-301 of this title;
submit an application to the Comptroller on the form and containing the information that the Comptroller requires; and
pay to the Comptroller a fee of $500.

An applicant for a license to act as a wholesaler shall:
submit an application to the Comptroller on the form and containing the information that the Comptroller requires; and
pay to the Comptroller a fee of $750.
If a person has had a license revoked under § 16-210 of this subtitle, the person may not reapply for a license within 1 year after the date when the prior license was revoked.

section.section:
In addition to the license fee otherwise required under this section:
an applicant for the initial issuance of a license issued by the Comptroller under this title shall pay to the Comptroller a nonrefundable application fee of $200; and
an applicant for renewal of a license issued by the Comptroller under this title shall pay to the Comptroller a renewal fee of $30.
The application and renewal fees required under this subsection do not apply to a license that is issued by the clerk or to a storage warehouse license application.
